goals.active: Blast your way into the Moon Fortress.
goals.complete: We fought our way across the bridge and blasted open the fortress gates, only to find it swarming with the Scarab Plague. The Primeval army stayed to fight while Braham and I looked for another way in.

goals.active: Learn the depths of Joko's hatred.
goals.complete: Braham and I found a signet ring that dispels illusions in one of Joko's torture chambers.

goals.active: Fight your way to the ossuary.
goals.complete: We fought our way through the Moon Fortress, disarming traps and battling minions, until we reached the ossuary.
I unlocked the entrance to the Contaminarium, defeated Joko's Beastmarshal, and walked straight into a trap. Braham saved me and was trapped instead.

I battled Joko until he fell, releasing Braham from his trap. Although Joko appeared to be dead at first, he had a surprise up his sleeve. Fortunately, Aurene was nearby. At a critical moment, she flew in for a snack. Together, we contained the Scarab Plague, ended Joko's tyrannous reign, and provided Gorrik with scientific samples.
